summary: 'Captain Marvel' Becomes Highest-Grossing Film Scored by a Female Composer
title: 'Captain Marvel' Becomes Highest-Grossing Film Scored by a Female Composer
description:
Pinar Toprak created the perfect blend of superhero and 90’s intrigue with her score for the film, and we are thrilled to see this particular title succeed.

According to Variety, the previous record-holders for female-composed films were Rachel Portman’s The Vow (which made $125 million domestic in 2012), and Deborah Lurie’s Dear John ($80 million back in 2010).

If you missed the numbers over the weekend, Captain Marvel took in around $455 million globally, making it the highest-grossing single hero origin film for Marvel Studios, and the 6th best film opening of all time (not just for Marvel).

summary: I saw CM with my brother and almost died because carol and maria! Have fun!
question: I saw CM with my brother and almost died because carol and maria! Have fun!
answer:
yessss, i’m super excited because it’s my dad taking me. he’s the only person in my family (other than my uncle who lives like and hour and a half away) who will geek out with me over superhero stuff.

he’s actually the one who got me into supergirl. so we can thank him for me discovering my two favorite dorks and creating this blog. 

shoutout to mike.

summary: How I imagine the beginning of endgame will go
title: How I imagine the beginning of endgame will go
body:
*Natasha pulling a gun on Carol as soon as she sees her standing behind her*
Nat: Who are you and how the hell did you get in here?
Carol: I'm who you've been calling for the last six and a half hours, in through the window and again, where is Fury?
Steve, gently lowering Nat's gun: Easy Natasha, Fury is gone, so is half of the universe.
Nat, slowly raising her gun again: How did you know Fury?
 *Carol rolling her eyes*
Carol: If you think I'm a threat, you're wrong, I know Fury personally, met him a few decades ago, know him enough to know he doesn't eat toast if it's cut diagonally, would a threat know that?
Steve: Why would Fury call you once people started to disappear?
Carol: Because I'm his emergency contact?
Everyone: ...
Carol: No, I'm serious, he was only to call me if it was a true emergency, so give me details, whose ass do I have to kick?

summary: 'Captain Marvel' Costume Collection Now Available
title: 'Captain Marvel' Costume Collection Now Available
body:
We’re still (a few) months away from Halloween, but the officially licensed Captain Marvel collection of costumes and accessories based on massive new Marvel adventure that is currently breaking records at the box office, is available online right now.

You can view the Captain Marvel collection currently available from Spirit Halloween, and then click on any of the links or photos below to order…

summary:
For you lovely folks already writing Danbeau (Carol x Maria) fic, I see you and you are so damn valid and appreciated.
Also...
body:
For you lovely folks already writing Danbeau (Carol x Maria) fic, I see you and you are so damn valid and appreciated.

Also there is not nearly enough of it and I’m chomping at the bit to contribute something. (I’m gonna have to make the time… because I still have this ridiculous Carol and Diana Prince fic idea rolling around in my head from months ago too.)
